01 Web Design / Development

You barely have enough time to handle the daily operations of your independent cafe, restaurant, or bed & breakfast, let alone worry about building a bespoke website. In an ever-evolving digital landscape, you want your website to reflect your physical space and make an impactful first impression. I’ll help you create a custom-coded website that connects your small hospitality business with your guests.

Typically Includes

  • Strategic single or multi page custom-coded websites
  • Custom creation to fit your unqiue brand
  • Using CSS, HTML & JavaScript
  • Mobile friendly & responsive design
  • Basic SEO optimisation
  • Fast & secure build
  • Analytics setup
  • Cross-browser compatibility testing
  • Custom Content Management System setup, for easy updates
  • Post-launch support

Potential add-ons

  • Ongoing Maintenance support
  • Booking engine integration
  • Social Media integration
  • Food & Restaurant Photography / content creation
  • Image Sourcing

Process

  • Strategy - Understanding your goals, vision, style and brand is important to create a website that speaks to your ideal audience. We dive deep into getting to the root of what you are trying to achieve, through a questionnaire and a strategy call.
  • Conceptualisation - We'll walk through moodboards and create a low-fidelity wireframe to bring your ideas and vision to life, making sure that we move forward with a cohesive visual style for your online home.
  • Creation - I use an approved wireframe / design to build a custom-coded website, completing it with a user-friendly CMS that you can update yourself.
  • Delivery - Crafted with your goals in mind, you will receive your final website, uniquely tailored to you. With your new website, we'll have a thorough handover, to make sure you feel prepared to use your new online home with confidence. Time to celebrate!

Timeline

A website can take anywhere between 3 to 12 weeks, depending on the complexity of features required.

*Bespoke quotes - starting at €999 for an essential website of 1-2 pages.

Book a call

02 Food / Restaurant Photography

For food and service-based businesses that believe every dish has a unique story to tell. I’ll capture the soul of your creations through professional photography, UGC and content creation, leaving your dream customers envisioning their next visit.

What to expect

Receive a fully edited gallery of images that have been discussed for their specific purposes in advance.

  • Food
  • Drinks
  • Restaurant
  • Product
  • Lifestyle

Potential add-ons

  • Advanced editing in Photoshop
  • Social Graphics
  • Specific Liscencing

Process

  • Strategy - Understanding your goals, vision, ideal guests and brand is important to create a photography that connects with your your ideal audience. We dive deep into getting to the root of what you are trying to achieve, through a strategy call.
  • Conceptualisation - We'll walk through moodboards and your ideas to come up with a concept and plan for shooting day.
  • Creation - I will be capturing your imagery, sharing updates along the way. Once the photos are taken, you will receive a gallery to select the final images for editing.
  • Delivery - Crafted with your goals in mind, you’ll receive your final images, ready to use!

Timeline

Photo delivery can take anywhere from 7+ days, depending on the complexity of setup and number of shots and editing required.

*Bespoke quotes for 1-2 hours of shooting time for up to 15 images - starting at €300. For more information or other options, feel free to reach out directly.

Ciao, I'm Tatjana

Your day is made when your service brings a smile to someone’s face? If that is you, then I'm glad you're here!

Growing up in Namibia, surrounded by nature and incredible wildlife, two things have always been important to me:

  1. Delivering memorable services and experiences
  2. Leaving a positive impact wherever I go

With a Bachelor in International Hospitality Management and a decade in the industry, hospitality to me, has always been about community and creating beautiful memories. My time in the industry has allowed me to create some of the most beautiful in-person moments.

Now, I bring that same dedication to helping small hospitality businesses shine online. Through strategic website design and food photography, I help you continue making a mark in the hearts of their guests, and create a lasting impression—both in your community and beyond.

Driven to make an impact. One dish at a time. One experience at a time.

By the time our work is done, you won’t just have a website or gorgeous new images. You’ll have a newfound confidence in your business that stems from knowing your digital presence aligns with your values, aspirations, and purpose - beyond the ordinary.
